30 Days of Buffy: Day 26 - Favorite Scooby moment

I guess this means an interaction between two members of the gang... and like yesterday's "saying" that's not something that can be easily narrowed down. As dialogue was pretty much covered yesterday my favourite scooby moment will be one that has no dialogue at all...

So...

Favorite Scooby moment is the lecture hall scene from Hush...
